original_text: This man was instructed in the way of the Lord; and being fervent in the spirit, he spake and taught diligently the things of the Lord, knowing only the baptism of John.
korean_text: 그가 일찍이 주의 도를 배워 열심으로 예수에 관한 것을 자세히 말하며 가르치나 요한의 세례만 알 따름이라

sentences.original_text: This man was instructed in the way of the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 이 사람은 주의 길에서 가르침을 받았다

sentences.original_text: and being fervent in the spirit
knowing only the baptism of John
